casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Jose Edis CARRANZA. No. 184P15-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Nov. 5, 2015. Jose Edis Carranza, Lumberton, for Carranza, Jose Edis. Joseph L. Hyde, Assistant Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. R. Andrew Murray, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

Opinion

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 1st of June 2015 by Defendant for Notice of Appeal:

"Motion Dismissed Ex Mero Motu by order of the Court in conference, this the 5th of November 2015."
